name: Designation of areas declared free or reasonably free of noxious weeds
text: §152-5  Designation of areas declared free or reasonably free of noxious weeds.  The department may declare the entire State, an island, or a section of an island as free or reasonably free of a specific noxious weed.  The department shall take necessary measures to restrict the introduction and establishment of specific noxious weeds in areas declared free or reasonably free of those noxious weeds. [L 1975, c 44, pt of §1; am L 1987, c 92, §5]
